title: COOL typography websites
content:
Does anyone know of any really cool websites that are only related to fonts? Just curious as if anyone has any suggestions and has seen anything that is worth while to look at.

 [‹ Pun Type Poster Competition](http://web.archive.org/web/20071215102550/http:/www.typophile.com/node/29259 "Go to previous forum topic") [An i for an ï and a ? for a tooth! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071215102550/http:/www.typophile.com/node/29047 "Go to next forum topic")
author: longlegzs80
